issue.title: [Python] Python support for fixed size list type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7261](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7261). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I didn't see any issue about this, but `FixedSizeListArray` (ARROW-1280) is not yet exposed in Python.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7261?focusedCommentId=16992574) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5906
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5906>
